name: Dredge The Depths (Discontinued)
description:
This game is currently incomplete and discontinued.

This is an underwater themed exploration horror game inspired by Subnautica and Ecco the Dolphin.

Press 'Z' at the title screen, then 'Z' again at the instructions screen to begin the game.

Controls:

Directional keys: Move around

Z: Use the laser drill (does nothing currently)

X: Does nothing currently
